positive.name: Zaphod Beeblebrox
positive.message: The person running this joint must be one cool frood, if you're travelling anywhere, Stonehenge is your path.

positive.name: Vaixons Zerai
positive.message: This place is so great, the smoothest transit I've had.

positive.name: Koq'od of Zorb
positive.message: Zorb declares journey has been a success. Zorb thanks you.

neutral.name: Vraphuk K'Naaaar
neutral.message: This place is ok, I guess. Could be better. Could be worse.

neutral.name: braalxeots
neutral.message: Not the worse travel experience I've ever had.

neutral.name: Alkar Vuun
neutral.message: Just sipping on my morning jarlak, reading the krook, Nothing special going on otherwise.

negative.name: Heircex the Invincible
negative.message: HEIRCEX DECLARES WAR ON TRANSIT AUTHORITY :(((((

negative.name: Dr. Ogmin 'Alan' Thrurruth
negative.message: Whoever runs this place could use an emergency brain transplant.

negative.name: Huuldrik
negative.message: Dear galaxy, Stonehenge is the worst. Place. Ever. #fail #commuteFromHell.

negative.name: Brakaaath Org Grah
negative.message: I'd give my seventh arm if I could find the person responsible for this mess. #stoneHengeFail
